paper.title: An introduction to informetrics

author.org: School of Library and Information Science, University of Western Ontario, London, Ontario N6G 1H1, Canada

paper.abstract: Abstract The scope and significance of the field of informetrics is defined and related to the earlier fields of bibliometrics and scientometrics. The phenomena studied by informetricians are identified. The major contributors to the field in the past are described and current emphases are related to the contributions in this Special Issue.
